column1: New: To commemorate the third anniversary of the Afghanistan withdrawal, I’m told Donald Trump will be at Arlington National Cemetery tomorrow to honor the fallen soldiers in a private event.  He’ll be joined by some of the family members of those killed during the withdrawal.
Trump has used everyone around him for his personal gains. Values, Purpose, Sacrifice mean nothing to him.   #TrumpIsUnfitForOffice #VeteransForHarrisWalz #Vete
And emily is scared of losing her climate change job.
